OCC.DAT: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1043{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier New;}{\f2\fnil Verdana;}} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\lang1033\b\f0\fs16 Application Server\par \b0\par When the Userver is used as an Application Server, the Application Shell (APS) is activated for every external activated operation:\par \par Userver->Urouter->Userver\par \par The order in which triggers are fired in the Userver is:\par \pard{\pntext\f0 1.\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlbody\pnf0\pnindent0\pnstart1\pndec{\pntxta.}} \ltrpar\fi-360\li720 APS: trigger apstart (return value ignored)\par {\pntext\f0 2.\tab}DSP: operation init (as part of new instance)\par {\pntext\f0 3.\tab}DSP: trigger preActivate\lang1043\par \lang1033{\pntext\f0 4.\tab}DSP: operation MyRequestedOperation\lang1043\par \lang1033{\pntext\f0 5.\tab}DSP: trigger postActivate\lang1043\par \lang1033{\pntext\f0 6.\tab}DSP: operation cleanup (as part of delete instance)\par \pard\ltrpar\lang1043\par \lang1033\b Instructions\par \pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\b0 1.\tab Create a custom Application Shell (APS) from this template.\par 2.\tab Give it a name, e.g. MYASV\par 3.\tab Write script\par 4.\tab Configure the URouter assignment file to use this Application Shell (APS):\line On Windows (usysins:common\\adm\\urouter.asn):\par \pard\ltrpar\f1 asv="usysins:common\\bin\\userver.exe" /dir="myProjectFolder" /asn=asv.asn MYASV.aps\par \pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\f0 5.\tab The default used APS, when not specified in the Urouter assignment file, is USERVER\par 6.\tab Configure the assignment file of the caller process to redirect services (SVC) to this request:\line E.g. in your wasv.asn:\par \pard\ltrpar\li-142\f1 [PATHS]\line $asv=tcp:localhost|<user>|<password>|asv\par [SERVICES_EXEC]\par MYSVC=$asv:MYSVC\par \pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\f0 7.\tab Restart the Urouter after every change or kill all userver processes\par 8.\tab Test\par \pard\ltrpar\lang1043\f2\par }
